artist: Artist: Philippe Jacques de Loutherbourg II
description: cattle and calves on shore at center, with sailboats at right; shack at left; figures left of center, accompanying cattle, and on rocks at right, watching boats
inscription:
Inscription

at bottom, printed in black: [Dessiné et gravé par P.J. Loutherbourg.  Le Soir]; on back, in brown ink: [No 1]
portfolio: From Les Quatre Heures du Jour
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Boston, Mass., until 1999; sold set of four prints in July for PROO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1999-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Le Soir, from "Les Quatre Heures du Jour"
